    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:fnbe.profium.com:http://www2.edu.fi/materiaalipankki/files/orig/278_3-nukkaa-solmittu.jpg</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>fnbe</catalog>
            <entry>http://www2.edu.fi/materiaalipankki/files/orig/278_3-nukkaa-solmittu.jpg</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fi">3 nukkaa solmittu</string>
            <string language="en">3 tuft yarns tied</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">3 Büschelgarne banden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">3 filés de touffe attachés</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">3 fios do topete amarraram</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">3 filati del trapuntare hanno legato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">3 νήματα τουφών που δένονται</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">3 hilados del penacho ataron</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fi">Mustavalkoisessa viivapiirroksessa esitetään ryijyn aloitus kolmen nukkalangan solmimisen jälkeen.</string>
            <string language="en">Black-and-white line drawing of the start of a rya rug after tying three tuft yarns.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fi">nukkalanka</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwarzweiss-Zeile Zeichnung des Anfangs einer 
rya Wolldecke, nachdem drei Büschelgarne gebunden worden sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ligne noire et blanche schéma du début d'une 
couverture de rya après avoir attaché trois filés de touffe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Linha black-and-white desenho do começo de um 
tapete do rya após ter amarrado três fios do topete.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riga in bianco e nero illustrazione dell'inizio 
di una coperta di rya dopo la legatura dei tre filati del trapuntare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραπτό σχέδιο γραμμών της έναρξης μιας κουβέρτας 
rya μετά από να δέσει τρία νήματα τουφών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Línea blanca y negro gráfico del comienzo de 
una manta del rya después de atar tres hilados del penacho.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
